entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 30 April 2023
